title: Game Map
description: The structure of how a map is stored. There must be at least one room, the entry, in a given map. Then entry is the only one that can have its id as 0.

id.description: Specification for a given room in a map.

isEntry.description: Whether this room is the entry. Note, only one entry is allowed per map.

hasLoot.description: Whether this room has loot. 0 for false|none, 1 for true

hasEnemies.description: Whether this room has enemies. 0 for false|none, 1 for true

exits.description: The possible exits (id) that this room has. Index 0 is for the north exit, 1 for the east, 2 for the south, and 3 for the west. -1 for no exit.

info.description: The description of the room to be used in the game. It is used as-is within game.

lootTable.description: The possible loot items that the room can have. At gametime, only one is chosen.

enemyTable.description: The possible enemies that the room can contain. At gametime, only one is chosen.
